DOC.brief_title: rTMS Executive Function Deficits Autism Spectrum Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double blind , sham control study evaluate efficacy repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) treatment executive function deficit individual autism spectrum disorder 16 25 year age . The study duration approximately 3 month , rTMS session last 4 week , 5 time week , 1 hour . Several scale use assess symptom severity adaptive functioning . Cognition assess use validated battery . This study also involve type brain image know magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) begin end 4 week daily rTMS good understand effect rTMS brain structure function . Investigators measure size connection different part brain ass brain structure blood flow participant complete basic task asses brain function .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Autism Spectrum Disorder ( ASD ) : Are fluent English language Have diagnosis high functioning ASD ( HFASD ) ( i.e. , verbal Intelligence Quotient ( IQ ) â‰¥ 70 ) Are competent consent base subject ' ability provide spontaneous narrative description key element study Are clinically stable determine treat physician , medication change past 4 week Exclusion Criteria ( ASD ) : Have history substance abuse dependence last 6 month positive urine toxicology screen Have concomitant major medical neurologic illness Have seizure past , firstdegree relative epilepsy Have abnormal clinical EEG Are pregnant likely get pregnant next 4 week Are clinically unstable Are benzodiazepine anticonvulsant medication Have history rTMS treatment . Inclusion Criteria ( Healthy Controls ) : Are fluent English language Competent consent Exclusion Criteria ( Healthy Controls ) : Have history substance abuse dependence last 6 month positive urine toxicology screen Have major medical neurologic illness Have diagnose learn disorder impaired academic adaptive functioning history Are pregnant Have IQ < 80 Have psychiatric diagnosis diagnostic interview assessment .
